text: Marie Madeleine Berthe LeBeau (10 June 1923 - 1 May 2016) was a French movie actress. She was known for her roles in Hold Back the Dawn, Gentleman Jim, Casablanca, Paris After Dark, and 8Â½. LeBeau died on 1 May 2016 in Estepona, Spain, after breaking her femur in a fall, aged 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1923 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Actors from Hauts-de-Seine Category:French movie actors
title: Madeleine LeBeau
